Content: @gcharang Hey hey, seem to have run into a problem, the loading screen just says "Activating best chain..." but never does anything. I think it downloaded about 5% of the blockclain stuff, and then it closed itself down, and now it gets stuck on this screen forever... any ideas?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
> just stays like that for eternity
this is expected. It might stay like that for more than a day depending on your connection speed and location
you could use a bootstrap if you don't want to wait

Author: David Jackson#9229
Content: really? before, it actually opened up the wallet, and I could see that there was 5% downloaded... now all I get is this screen. Is that normal?

Content: which OS are you using?

Author: David Jackson#9229
Content: Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: can you issue the command `htop` in a terminal ?

Author: David Jackson#9229
Content: ah, is it like task manager? what kind of thing am I looking for with all these numbers I see?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: see if any of the horizontal bars in the top part are showing a red 100%

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
> ah, is it like task manager? 
yup
